name: Chromatic Monsters
description:
-Alejandro Clotet as Producer and Programmer.  -Pablo Molina as Programmer. 

-José Antonio Montiel as Programmer and Multipurpose. 

-Laura Patón as Programmer and Audio Designer.

-Mararía Ortiz as Graphic Artist and Audio Designer. 

-Rafael Rojas as Graphic Artist and Programmer. -Irene Sánchez as a Programmer. 

 The development team of the videogame Chromatic Monsters is made up of students from ESCAV, who made this videogame as the final project of the project subject of 3D animations, games and interactive environments. The preproduction phase was led by: 

-Emilio Kessel Moya 

-José Antonio Montiel -Roger Granés 

-José María Callejas 

-Rafael Salom 

 Minimum requirements: 

Commodore 64 or higher. 

Recommended requirements: 

I9 to 4Ghz and HTC VIVE
